Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of tax liens by a tax district in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Prohibits the sale of tax liens by a tax district in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง1190, RPT L; amd ยง11-319, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the sale of tax liens by a tax district in a city with a population of one million or more
